name: places/ChIJJ0QtEmD1wokRufoffpGfBiQ
formattedAddress: 12-18 Ellwood St, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12-18 Ellwood St, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text: I absolutely loved this school. It’s in the hood but the school was extremely safe and the teachers and staff were all caring and loving educators. The children here usually behave well only a few bad apples. But I loved this school although I was there years ago I still remember all the good memories.

text.text: I absolutely loved this school. It’s in the hood but the school was extremely safe and the teachers and staff were all caring and loving educators. The children here usually behave well only a few bad apples. But I loved this school although I was there years ago I still remember all the good memories.

originalText.text: I am a local dog walker and I notice every single detail on garbage lying around and littering on sidewalks and streets and I can tell you this, this is one of the cleanest sidewalks in front of the school I have ever seen in the neighborhoods of Washington Heights and Inwood. I’m constantly putting up recent pictures of places that should clean up their sidewalks and help our town look better. Let’s stop blaming others and do something about it.

originalText.text: I loved this school didn’t want to leave to middle school but unfortunately they don’t have a middle school in there
